'''Frostbloom Kamifubuki''' is [[Kamisato Ayaka]]'s [[Level 3 Constellation]].

==Trivia==
* "Kamifubuki" {{Lang|ja={{Rubi|紙|かみ|吹|ふ|雪|ぶき}}}} means "confetti". The kanji in the word literally means "paper snowstorm".
